title: get fit?
body: Recently a special someone mentioned that I wasn't really in the shape that I  should be.  I know that stopping video games is out of the question, so it gave me an idea. What if i created a penalty for losing and dieing? So As of right now When I loose a game I have to go for a one mile run. and for every time i die regardless of win or lose I have to do 5 sit-ups and 5 push-ups. is anyone else with me?

replies.body:
What about your 3/0 Udyr victory match though? RIP exercise? =c So every match you win with 0 deaths, you're free from exercise, eh. lol

P.S. 8 losses. Enjoy that 8 mile run. lol 305 sit-ups/push-ups though... Wow... If you do your exercise now starting from your 7/7 Ashe defeat match. I think my math is right. That should give you a good start on losing that last bit of flab. =P

Make sure you stretch properly for a good amount of time, not only will it make the exercise feel better, it will also make it more effective. After exercising always do a cooldown exercise, this also lessens the burden on your body and makes it more effective.   

 * A good exercise routine:  
  * 10 Crunches  
  * 5 Push-ups  
  * 10 Squats  

I would recommend doing 1 set for every loss. Maybe add 1 of each exercise for every 2-3 deaths?  

A mile is a tough run even for someone only slightly out of shape, not a bad idea but id suggest doing stretches then a similar routine to the above one before running.  

Doing this at least 3 times everyday in the morning is also just a great way to start the day, so i would recommend doing that instead of this punishment game (never want to make exercising seem like a punishment even if its just for fun, half the battle is psychological lol).

I think you're underestimating how much a mile run is if you're out of shape. Also, 5 push-ups/sit-ups are a lot if you're playing for a while. YOu could actually really hurt yourself if you force yourself to do all of that. How about instead-

Every loss: 5 pushups
Every win: 1 pull up( if you can)
Every Death: 2 pushups
Every Kill: 2 sit ups
Every penta: A cookie

XD I'm not all that out of shape, just a lil flabby on the edges its not like I'm spilling over my seat or anything, I used to play football and school (welding) keeps me pretty active. just wanna lose that last little flab :P

after burn effect.
do your football exercises and you're set.

just play game all day erday and let the after burn effect do the rest.

The exercise if you win/lose/die/kill/penta thing is not efficient
In fact, you can say it's outright useless. exercise is meant to be done in chunks. lifting barbell once every 5 minute will get you no where. taking one step every 2 minutes just makes you slow. either do an entire exercise if you win/lose/die/kill/penta which will take a good 10-30 minutes if you want something to happen, or exercise afterwards which is the same as not counting your wins/loses/kills/deaths/pentas.
My suggestion: go afk and get that 20minute "lower priority queue" and just exercise while waiting to queue (that new leaver buster system got me fit :P)... or just have some self control and actually give yourself a good hour to exercise. it's -1 game basically.

Whennnnnn I feel like I haven't hit the gym enough lately I definitely impose the penalty system for playing league. But as far as getting fit goes if you can squeeze in an hour a day 3-5 days a week. You will see killer results. The hardest part about exercising is getting your routine started. After that you will surprise yourself at what you can accomplish.

If you can get a hold of one, I've heard multiple accounts of people who found success getting fit gaming while running on a treadmill. Not every game suits that kind of excercise (pretty much needs to be a game that can be played with a controller), still, if you're interested in getting in shape while still playing video games, it's worth looking into.
Get Fit With Snoopeh is pretty fun. :3
